name: @flanc/router-graphql
description: The graphql router for flanc apis

scripts.build: rm -rf ./bin && tsc --esModuleInterop true  --skipLibCheck true --outDir ./bin src/**/*.ts ../../../node_modules/flanc/types.d.ts && cp ./publish-package.json ./bin/package.json && cp ./README.md ./bin/README.md && cp ./types.d.ts ./bin/types.d.ts
